Spokane.MultiCare Deaconess Hospital:
MultiCare Deaconess Hospital is a 307-bed non-profit general medical and surgical hospital in the northwest United States, located in Spokane, Washington. Established in 1896, the hospital has 1,604 employees, and operates a Level III trauma center.


== History ==
Deaconess Hospital was established 122 years ago in 1896 as one of the first hospitals in Spokane.
